data.name: Organic Search - Basics of SEO
data.summary:
Unit 1 - Gain An Understanding Of Search Engine Algorithms
You'll learn how search engines like Google, Bing & Yahoo function.

Unit 2 - How They Affect Organic Search Results And Websites
In-depth knowledge about how search engines affect search results, websites and thus business.

Unit 3 - Building On This Knowledge
You’ll learn the key elements for creating an effective SEO strategy.

Unit 4 - Working With Keywords
How to select keywords and perform keyword research based on consumer psychology and search behaviour.

Unit 5 - On-Page SEO
How to conduct on-page SEO analysis to identify opportunities to improve a website’s search optimization.
data.speakers:
Asad Khan
Associate Vice President – SEO
